{"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"又看着你长大了一岁。
和那时相比，你的的确确褪去了青涩，在舞台上更加游刃有余了。但是一直不变的是，你在任何环境里，都是最有偶像气质的那个。
大概找到原因了。真心追逐着光芒的人，才会懂得怎么向他人散发光芒。
ayasa，生日快乐[爱心]🎂","id":87551386,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":1128,"img_size":313.68,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/0a812eeda9373535a3c64ee7a0622988ff8d0382.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1504},{"img_height":383,"img_size":40.97,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/f97ce73f361d1a78d44abde77bcc06d8af337f7d.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":680},{"img_height":768,"img_size":86.84999999999999,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/e6d8cab7955e3b68dc3ead6c0595563c3574ebc7.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1024},{"img_height":1500,"img_size":322.29,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/69764119f4b1b3467a46c190a66a0325fac93772.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":2000},{"img_height":2046,"img_size":434.29,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/2d2ed1f9703757e066d05e4a9e3b42db55fb5fcc.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1534},{"img_height":1478,"img_size":294.75,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/6bfed0366c07af7b074f0f6f4fdfc869afc08ef7.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1108},{"img_height":1500,"img_size":312.96,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/f1b23a13ba36032906dce4acb031cd27d72d66f8.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":2000},{"img_height":1280,"img_size":116.56,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/0826da15fec10e5cdb9fbcc9df3d155b6fdb1444.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":959},{"img_height":1128,"img_size":353.62,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/576e1459b59fea8390bc8fd7d95b2459140cb413.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1504}],"pictures_count":9,"reply":78,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1597674221},"user":{"head_url":"https://i1.hdslb.com/bfs/face/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":1579017600000,"label":{"label_theme":"","path":"","text":""},"nickname_color":"","status":0,"theme_type":0,"type":1,"vip_pay_type":0}}}
